1.q_string:
If \(a_{1}, a_{2}, a_{3},=t_{9}, a_{9}\) are in GP, then what is the value of the following determinant?

\(\left|\begin{array}{lll}\ln a_{1} & \ln a_{2} & \ln a_{3} \\ \ln a_{4} & \ln a_{5} & \ln a_{6} \\ \ln a_{7} & \ln a_{8} & \ln a_{9}\end{array}\right|\)
Find the value of \(\left|\begin{array}{lll}0 & c & b \\ c & 0 & a \\ b & a & 0\end{array}\right|^{2}\).

If \(\omega\) is the cube root of unity, then what is the value of:

\(\left|\begin{array}{ccc}1 & \omega & \omega^{2} \\ \omega & \omega^{2} & 1 \\ \omega^{2} & 1 & \omega\end{array}\right|\)

If \(x,y,z\) are all different and not equal to zero and \(\left|\begin{array}{ccc}1+x & 1 & 1 \\ 1 & 1+y & 1 \\ 1 & 1 & 1+z\end{array}\right|=0\) then the value of \(x^{-1}+y^{-1}+z^{-1}\) is equal to:

What is the value of the determinant \(\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\mathrm{i} & \mathrm{i}^{2} & \mathrm{i}^{3} \\ \mathrm{i}^{4} & \mathrm{i}^{6} & \mathrm{i}^{8} \\ \mathrm{i}^{9} & \mathrm{i}^{12} & \mathrm{i}^{15}\end{array}\right|\) where \(\mathrm{i}=\sqrt{-1} ?\)
A determinant (Δ) of 3 rows (R1, R2, R3) and 3 columns (C1, C2, C3) has a value Δ = 15. If two columns C2 and C3 of determinant (Δ) are interchanged, then the value of determinant will be
The value of \(\left|\begin{array}{ccc}a & b & c \\ b+c & c+a & a+b \\ a^2 & b^2 & c^2\end{array}\right|\)
The value of \(\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\sin ^2 x & \cos ^2 x & 1 \\ \cos ^2 x & \sin ^2 x & 1 \\ -10 & 12 & 2\end{array}\right|\)

If \(a, b, c\) are real numbers, then the value of the determinant

\(\left|\begin{array}{lll}1-a & a-b-c & b+c \\ 1-b & b-c-a & c+a \\ 1-c & c-a-b & a+b\end{array}\right|\)

q_option: \(\frac{a}{b}\) is one of the cube roots of unity
\(\frac{a}{b}\) is one of the cube roots of \(-1\)
a is one of the cube roots of unity
\(b\) is one of the cube roots of unity

If Δ is the value of the determinant 

\(\left|\begin{array}{lll}a_1 & b_1 & c_1 \\ a_2 & b_2 & c_2 \\ a_3 & b_3 & c_3\end{array}\right|\)

(p ≠ 0 or 1, q ≠ 0 or 1)
